name: CQ.themes.Highlight
doc: The theme-specific constants for CQ.Highlight.This class is a singleton and cannot be created dir...

props.name: FLASH_COLOR
props.doc:
<static> The hexadecimal color value for the flashing effect
(defaults to "#ab6fc7").

props.name: FLASH_DURATION
props.doc: <static> The duration of the flashing effect in seconds (defaults to 0.3).

props.name: FLASH_NUM
props.doc: <static> The number of times to repeat the flashing effect (defaults to 3).

props.name: FRAME_PADDING
props.doc:
<static> The padding between the element and the highlight frame in pixels
(defaults to 2).

props.name: FRAME_WIDTH
props.doc: <static> The width of the highlight frame in pixels (defaults to 10).
